root: ^I finally arrived at the southern most part of the kingdom.
^This is my first job as a Royal Flower Picker, hand-picked specifically by The King himself.
^I can't let him or the other Royal Flower Pickers down.
^This village is apparently in need of some flowers. I'll try my best and hope the training pays off.
^Better hurry, if I continue down this path, I should reach the village soon.
